searchUrl.title: LinkedIn Job Search URLs
searchUrl.description: Full LinkedIn job search URLs with all filters applied. Go to LinkedIn jobs search, apply your filters, then copy the URL from the address bar.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape

minDelayBetweenRequests.title: Min Delay Between Requests (ms)
minDelayBetweenRequests.description: Minimum delay in milliseconds between requests to avoid detection

maxDelayBetweenRequests.title: Max Delay Between Requests (ms)
maxDelayBetweenRequests.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds between requests

linkedinCookies.title: LinkedIn Session Cookies (Optional)
linkedinCookies.description: JSON-formatted LinkedIn session cookies for authenticated scraping

customUserAgent.title: Custom User Agent (Optional)
customUserAgent.description: Custom user agent string. Leave empty to use random realistic user agents.

detailedScraping.title: Scrape More Details (Slower)
detailedScraping.description: Enable detailed scraping including skills, company info, and additional job details. This will slow down the scraper but provide more comprehensive data.

scrapeSkills.title: Scrape Skills Requirements
scrapeSkills.description: Extract required skills from job descriptions. Only works when 'Scrape More Details' is enabled.

scrapeCompanyDetails.title: Scrape Company Details
scrapeCompanyDetails.description: Extract company information (size, industry, description). Only works when 'Scrape More Details' is enabled.

extendOutputFunction.title: Custom Output Function
extendOutputFunction.description: Custom JavaScript function to extend output

customData.title: Custom Data
customData.description: Custom data to include with each job record
